description:
Brand new apartment located in NYC's historic area of Washington Heights. With exposed brick, modern accents and 2 spacious bedrooms I'm sure you'll enjoy your stay. Located close to the A & C Train, you are just 15 minutes from Time Square and easily accessible to other attractions. 

Guest Access: I have a superintendent available
name: Large Chic Upstown NYC Apartment
review: nice place to stay/beautiful apartment. subway station is a block away and there are lots of places to eat within a 5-10min radius.
